cast.overview: In the not-too-distant future, the aging gene has been switched off. To avoid overpopulation, time has become the currency and the way people pay for luxuries and necessities. The rich can live forever, while the rest struggle to negotiate for their immortality. A poor young man who suddenly comes into a fortune of time finds himself on the run from a corrupt police force known as the "time keepers".
cast.title: In Time

details.biography:
British actor known for playing Zakk in Hulu’s 2022 series ‘Pam and Tommy’, and Clyde in ‘Into The Arms of Danger’ opposite Academy Award nominee Cathy Moriarty. He also recurs in Amazon Prime series ‘Bosch’, and Crackle’s exclusive British comedy ‘We Are CVNT5’.

Meader's love of acting grew through theatre, with which he has traveled across Europe, the US, and Asia. He most recently performed on stage at The Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre in 'The Heart of Robin Hood' with the Icelandic National Theatre company, Vesturport.

Born on the Isle of Man, and raised on the island of Guernsey, he is a dual UK/US citizen.
details.name: Sam Meader
